issue.title: SiteMap error
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

If a metadata has never been updated, the lastmod field is considered invalid : 0000-00-00.
Use create date instead where never modified.

```

Google:
Erreurs Date non valideTag : lastmod Valeur : 0000-00-00
```


**Fixed versions :** 4.4.4
